00024 #ifndef MEDIAN_H
00025 #define MEDIAN_H
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 #include"SortingHeuristic.h"
00030 #include"IntSet.h"
00031 
00032 class Median: public SortingHeuristic {
00033 protected:
00036   bool use_true_median;
00037 
00038   virtual bool sortNodes() {
00043     IntSet::setRatio(0.0);
00044 
00045     if( use_true_median ) {
00046       IntSet::setTrueMedian();
00047     }
00048     return SortingHeuristic::sortNodes();
00049   }
00050 
00051 public:
00053   Median(BiGraph & bigraph, bool stable, bool no_improvement,
00054          bool true_median): SortingHeuristic(bigraph, stable, no_improvement),
00055                             use_true_median(true_median) { }
00056 };
00057 
00058 #endif
